Inclusion Criteria : Obese woman body mass index ( BMI ) > 25 kg / m² , age 18 year LDL-C > 100 mg / dl For treatment simvastatin 80 mg , participant receive two identical vial , contain simvastatin 40 mg. For treatment combination simvastatin 10 mg ezetimibe 10 mg , participant receive two identical bottle , one bottle simvastatin 10 mg , another bottle ezetimibe 10mg . In control group , participant receive two identical bottle , bottle contain inert tablet . Each group 20 participant . Dependent Variable ( Final Primary Outcome ) : Percentage change vasodilation brachial artery flow-mediated , treatment eight week . Covariates : clinical , biochemical marker ultrasound .
